Understate: The claim understates Joe Biden's actual policy on fracking, which is to end new gas and oil production on federal lands, but not ban fracking outright.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Joe Biden's policy on fracking was to ban it outright.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that Joe Biden's policy on fracking was an outright ban, when in fact it was more nuanced.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation to the claim, which is that Joe Biden's policy was to end new gas and oil production on federal lands, but not ban fracking outright.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Joe Biden's policy on fracking was not an outright ban, but rather a restriction on new leases on federal lands.
